C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: LLVM, Standard: Cpp11, ColumnLimit: 0, IndentWidth: 4, UseTab: Never, MaxEmptyLinesToKeep: 2, SortIncludes: false, BreakBeforeBinaryOperators: All ,BreakBeforeBraces: Linux, AlignAfterOpenBracket: DontAlign, SpaceBeforeParens: ControlStatements, AlwaysBreakTemplateDeclarations: true, AlignEscapedNewlines: Left, PointerAlignment: Left, AccessModifierOffset: -4, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: All, SpacesBeforeTrailingComments: 2, CommentPragmas: '[!\\*]' }
C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: LLVM, Standard: Cpp11, ColumnLimit: 0, IndentWidth: 4, UseTab: Never, MaxEmptyLinesToKeep: 2, SortIncludes: false, BreakBeforeBinaryOperators: All ,BreakBeforeBraces: Linux, AlignAfterOpenBracket: DontAlign, SpaceBeforeParens: ControlStatements, AlwaysBreakTemplateDeclarations: true, AlignEscapedNewlines: Left, PointerAlignment: Left, AccessModifierOffset: -4, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: All, SpacesBeforeTrailingComments: 2, CommentPragmas: '[!\\*]' }
